description:
Enjoy a thrilling journey through the habitats of the most extraordinary animals from around the world!  From tropical rainforests to inhospitable deserts, you'll explore how these creatures cleverly adapt to their environments.
Throughout the game, we reveal fascinating tidbits about the animals' behaviour and unique characteristics, from epic migrations to camouflaged abilities. You'll appreciate the amazing diversity of life on Earth and recognise the importance of protecting these environments and their inhabitants - join an educational and exciting journey that will connect you more deeply with the natural world!
name: Animals - Habitats and Curiosities
